premise_source_doc_sentence: He is the author of Act Like a Lady , Think Like a Man , which was published in March 2009 , and the book Straight Talk , No Chaser : How to Find and Keep a Man .

Matthews has authored three comic books : `` Steve Harvey : The Life of Steve Harvey ''  (  2016  )  , `` Pompeii : Lost and Found ''  (  2015  )  , and `` Sitting Bull : A Life Story ''  (  2015  )  .
